title: Dear riot. Do you have any plans buffing diana/changing her?
body: I feel at the moment {{champion:131}} is not that strong in the current meta and is having a hard time coping. This coming from a diana main with 120 games on her last season and going from silver to plat last season by just playing her. Now this season  i only got around 16 because i feel she is way to weak? So are you looking to change her at this given time. I also feel with the abbysal change it won't be a viable rush which is core on her.

replies.body: Diana is fine. Theres a small nerf to her because of the abyssal changes but otherwise she's still a great champion.

I reckon diana is weak early but gets a big power spike at 6.  Not much you can do pre-6 against a mage with more range but once 6 hits the gap closer is devastating.

but levels 1-5 are zzzzz
Diana is probably one of the most well rounded champs
I feel like Di is fine.
Weak? Oh man. She is very very strong tbh.
Diana is strong atm, what are you on about?

Riot don't buff a champion based on the meta.
Riot have zero control or influence on the meta, and they prefer to keep it that way as they don't want to have any influence on what champions are played at a given time.

In the current meta Diana is strong, she's a strong champion.
I've seen no problems with her this season.
If you're having problems with her I suggest trying a different build, Diana is a highly versatile champion that can be played many ways with different AP item build paths.
I personally don't like using Nashor's Tooth on her, but I find myself using it a fair bit depending on the team comps I am matched with.
wait till after the mid seasone mage update, new items etc and item reworks may change this :)
